text:
@realDonaldTrump How to come out of covid-19. Very simple solution.

DO NOTHING. No monitoring. No briefing. No reporting in any media. It's all GARBAGE.

No lockdowns, no social distancing, no masks, no restrictions.. Let things go on as usual. 

Covid-19 will settle on its own.
